column1: #Text=Kyoshi Warrior # 1 says : " Must have been some fight . "
#Text=Suki says : " Wait , let me see that .
#Text=He 's been lost for a while and he looks like he 's hurt .
#Text=" Kyoshi Warrior # 1 says : " I ca n't believe you found the Avatar 's bison .
#Text=Did n't you just see the Avatar a few days ago ?
#Text=" Suki says : " Yes , so he ca n't be too far from here .
#Text=It 's our responsibility to get Appa back to him safely .
#Text=This could be our most important mission yet .
#Text=And we can help you find Aang .
